metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2241 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in PoDoFo0.10.0. Affected is the function readXRefStreamEntry of the filePdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp. The manipulation leads to heap-based bufferoverflow. An attack has to be approached locally. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. The patch is identified as535a786f124b739e3c857529cecc29e4eeb79778. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. VDB-227226 is the identifier assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
